post.title: official nvidia 177.79 beta drivers released
post.content: nvidia released some new official beta drivers, only supports geforce 8/9/200 series in the inf. http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp_177.79_beta.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp64_177.79_beta.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...7.79_beta.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...7.79_beta.html
